relproducts.title: Rimini Sand - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Rimini sand's pale yellow-cream hue is a pretty, uplifting addition to any window. Its light translucency means that plenty of light penetrates it, even when closed, so you'll never be lacking in sunshine. Pair sand with navy blues and light-coloured woods for a modern look with a unique twist, or with browns, greens, and golds for something classic and luxurious. Either of these would be the perfect look for the living room or dining room in a contemporary, stylish home.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Stone Beige
relproducts.description: Stirlo stone beige plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.
